message.content:
Research Torre.ai - a professional networking and job matching platform. Find out:
1. What Torre.ai is and its core value proposition
2. How their job matching / talent matching works
3. Their "genome" or skill-based matching system
4. Key features of the platform (job search, talent search, profiles)
5. Their API capabilities if any
6. How candidates and companies interact on the platform
7. Any unique UX patterns they use

Search the web for this information and return a comprehensive summary.

input.query: Torre.ai professional networking job matching platform overview 2024
Torre.ai genome skill-based matching system how it works

content.content:

Links: [{"title":"Torre's Job-Matching Model","url":"https://torre.ai/jobmatchingmodel"},{"title":"Torre’s Job-Matching Model | Genome completion","url":"https://torre.ai/jobmatchingmodel/genomecompletion"},{"title":"Torre OS: The most advanced CRM and applicant tracking system","url":"https://torre.ai/os"},{"title":"Professional genomes: Tomorrow’s résumé today","url":"https://torre.ai/en/genome"},{"title":"How Does Torre Company Work? – CanvasBusinessModel.com","url":"https://canvasbusinessmodel.com/blogs/how-it-works/torre-how-it-works"},{"title":"ATS: The most advanced applicant tracking system","url":"https://torre.ai/ats"},{"title":"Torre Job Network: Vetted candidates. Millions of them.","url":"https://torre.ai/jobnetwork"},{"title":"Torre.ai: AI-Powered Recruitment Automation","url":"https://findmoreai.com/en/ai-tools/torre-ai"},{"title":"Torre.ai - Wikipedia","url":"https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torre.co"},{"title":"Subtorres: Your own job board and much more","url":"https://torre.ai/subtorres"}]

Based on the search results, here's how Torre.ai's genome skill-based matching system works:

## Professional Genome Overview

Torre users create a "genome," a profile that serves as an expanded résumé and includes information about their skills, experience, salary expectations, location and language preferences, and personality traits. Professional genomes include thousands of data points such as experience, hard and soft skills, preferences, interests and non-interests, psychometrics, professional behavior, self-awareness, learning speed and capabilities, contact networks, reference checks, recommendations, certifications, and more.

## AI-Powered Matching Process

Torre uses 9 types of AI for accurate matching: Decision-tree learning, Clustering, Large Language Models (GPT), Machine-learning regressions, PageRanks, Random forests, Gradient boosting regressors, Recommender engines, and Word2vec (NLP).

The algorithm evaluates and assigns scores to every existing candidate or job listing within the database. The scoring process is driven by the job description, which acts as a query generator, and they compare the attributes of a person's genome to see how well the candidate is able to perform the requirements of the jobs.

## Ranking and Skill Matching

Torre's skill graph knows how all professional skills relate to each other and improves matching automatically. The final stage involves ranking the candidates in descending order of suitability, with the "highest potential match" candidates taking the top positions and gradually descending to "lower potential matches."

## Data Completeness

The genome completion ranker ranks candidates based on how much information is on their genomes. Candidates that have more complete genomes will be more accurately ranked because there is more information to validate their ranking.

Millions of them.","url":"https://torre.ai/jobmarketplace"},{"title":"Subtorres: Your own job board and much more","url":"https://torre.ai/subtorres"},{"title":"Tech: State-of-the-art AI for recruiting and job hunting","url":"https://torre.ai/tech"},{"title":"Torre.ai - Ai Tool Details & Features","url":"https://airespo.com/ai-tools/torre-ai/"}]

Based on the web search results, here's an overview of Torre.ai as a professional networking and job matching platform in 2024:

## Platform Overview

Torre.ai is building the new global job network, including the protocols and infrastructure for the future of recruitment. The platform automates recruitment and job hunting with super-intelligent AI, positioning Torre as the AI talent agent for millions of professionals.

## Key Features & Technology

**AI-Powered Matching:**
Torre's operations analyzed over 10 million professional profiles in 2024, with the AI-driven approach reducing hiring time by up to 30%. Torre uses 9 types of AI for accurate matching, including Decision-tree learning, Clustering, Large Language Models (GPT), Machine-learning regressions, PageRanks, Random forests, Gradient boosting regressors, Recommender engines, and Word2vec (NLP).

**Professional Profiles:**
Professional genomes include thousands of data points such as experience, hard and soft skills, preferences, interests and non-interests, psychometrics, professional behavior, self-awareness, learning speed and capabilities, contact networks, reference checks, recommendations, and certifications.

## Services for Companies & Job Seekers

The platform automates recruitment from beginning to end and predicts whether a candidate will be a good fit for a job, team, and leader—and vice versa. For companies, Torre operations include features such as setting daily budgets for AI recruiters to attract candidates from over 100 sources, automating candidate pipelines, and using AI to manage applicants.

Emma, Torre's AI recruiter, finds, matches, and attracts candidates to job openings, helps them complete their applications, checks their references, and keeps them engaged for future job openings.

## Business Model & Growth

Founded in 2017, Torre has secured a total of $15 million in funding across multiple rounds, with its most recent being a $10 million Seed round in April 2021.

Based on the search results, here are Torre.ai's unique UX features for candidate and company interaction in 2024:

## Key Unique UX Features:

**For Candidate-Company Interaction:**

Torre matches candidates with job opportunities based on skills rather than traditional resumes, shifting the focus from mere qualifications to actual capabilities.

Candidates can see how they rank against other candidates using dozens of factors and know where they stand every step of the way.

Torre analyzes 40+ professional behavioral traits scientifically and automatically.

**User Interface Design:**

The interface is clean, intuitive, and user-friendly.

**AI-Powered Interaction Features:**

Torre leverages advanced AI algorithms to analyze vast amounts of data to create a 'professional genome' for each candidate, considering skills, experience, and career goals.

The platform automatically filters 6 or 7 ideal candidates from between 200 and 500 resumes, saving significant time.

**Transparency and Feedback:**

Often, candidates don't get the job, and in many cases, Torre will tell them why.

The platform's commitment to end-to-end recruitment automation covers over 90% of traditional recruiter work, making the process three times faster and 50% less expensive.

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Torre.ai API capabilities:

## Torre.ai API Overview

Torre offers endpoints and an MCP server to discover candidates, filter them, rank them, and everything in between.

### API for Companies

Torre gives you what you need to create your own AI agent using your preferred LLM, and allows you to store job requirements, candidates, and applications, and query them in multiple ways.

Key capabilities include:
- Determine what to offer based on actual compensation expectations of millions of candidates
- Seamlessly connect your ATS, HRIS, or ERP
- Determine what to offer based on actual compensation expectations of millions of candidates
- Torre API tells you what question to ask the candidate next to reduce match/unmatch uncertainty
- For new job openings, identify matching candidates from your database
- Torre's skill graph knows how all professional skills relate to each other

### API for Candidates

Endpoints and MCP server to discover jobs and let AI apply on your behalf. Torre API for candidates is in private beta.

For more detailed technical documentation, you may want to visit Torre's official API pages directly at torre.ai/apiforcompanies or torre.ai/apiforcandidates.

Based on the search results, here's a comprehensive overview of Torre.ai's professional genome and related concepts:

## Professional Genome Overview

A professional genome showcases experience, skills, interests, behavioral traits, psychometrics, recommendations, connections, reference checks, portfolio, and more in an engaging and attractive way.

## Data Points and Components

Professional genomes include thousands of data points such as experience, hard and soft skills, preferences, interests and non-interests, psychometrics, professional behavior, self-awareness, learning speed and capabilities, contact networks, reference checks, recommendations, certifications, and more.

More specifically, Torre captures thousands of data points for each candidate across more than 100 factors, including psychometrics, forming what Torre calls a person's "professional genome".

## Psychometrics in Torre

Torre analyzes 40+ professional behavioral traits scientifically and automatically. The psychometric assessments are based on established models—behavioral traits are based on the HEXACO model, OCP instrument, and Torre's own research.

## Purpose and Application

The collected information is processed through nine types of AI to predict a candidate's suitability not only for a job but also for a company and even a specific team within that company. Torre bypasses resumes by capturing thousands of data points because resumes are considered outdated and insufficient for effective AI integration.

Links: [{"title":"Emma of Torre.ai | Torre","url":"https://torre.ai/emma"},{"title":"Emma of Torre: Let Emma, Torre's AI recruiter, engage candidates for you","url":"https://torre.ai/emmaforcompanies"},{"title":"Torre.ai","url":"https://torre.ai/"},{"title":"Torre Hunt: Outsource your recruitment to Emma","url":"https://torre.ai/hunt"},{"title":"Emma Reach: Let Emma attract top and passive candidates for you","url":"https://torre.ai/reach"},{"title":"Tech: State-of-the-art AI for recruiting and job hunting","url":"https://torre.ai/tech"},{"title":"ATS: The most advanced applicant tracking system","url":"https://torre.ai/ats"},{"title":"We're the first company to fully automate recruiting end-to-end.","url":"https://torre.ai/en/about"},{"title":"Job distribution: 15+ channels to attract candidates","url":"https://torre.ai/jobdistribution"},{"title":"Torre.ai - Wikipedia","url":"https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torre.co"}]

Based on the search results, here's how Torre.ai's Emma AI recruiter works:

## Overview

Emma is Torre's self-driving AI recruiter. Torre is the first company to fully automate recruiting end-to-end and is the Waymo for recruiting.

## Key Functions

For companies, Emma will find, match, and attract candidates to job openings, helping them complete their applications, check their references, keep them engaged for future job openings, ask for referrals, and much more.

## How the Automated Process Works

The recruitment process involves several automated steps:

1. **Candidate Identification & Matching**: Emma identifies matching candidates from a 1+ billion database.

2. **Multi-Channel Outreach**: Emma identifies job boards, online communities, and social media groups and shares job openings there, activating dozens of acquisition channels automatically including referrals, job alerts, recruiter bot notifications, push notifications, email, WhatsApp, text messages, job boards, LinkedIn, TikTok, Facebook, X, sourcing, and more.

3. **Candidate Messaging**: Candidates apply on their own, or Emma applies on their behalf.

4. **Automated Communication**: Emma sets automated messages for candidates to be triggered at different stages of the recruitment process with automatic personalization and delivery via Torre Messenger, email, text messaging, and WhatsApp.

## AI Technology

Emma is powered by nine types of AI to match candidates, jobs, and teams with 112 factors, including Decision-tree learning, Clustering, Large Language Models (GPT), Machine-learning regressions, PageRanks, Random forests, Gradient boosting regressors, Recommender engines, and Word2vec (NLP).

## Results & Efficiency

This automation covers over 90% of the work traditionally done by recruiters, making the recruiting process three times faster, 50% less expensive, and significantly more accurate.

Based on the search results, here's an overview of Torre.ai:

## Overview

Torre is becoming the AI talent agent for millions of professionals. It is the first company to fully automate recruiting end-to-end.

## Founding

It was founded as a startup company in 2019 by Colombian-American entrepreneur Alexander Torrenegra, who is also its CEO. Torre is mainly owned by Emma, a holding company co-founded by Alexander Torrenegra, his wife Tania Zapata, and Santiago Jaramillo in 2019, which encompasses other of Torrenegra's companies, like Bunny Studio and Tribe.

## Mission

Their support is driven not only by the revolutionary nature of Torre's AI but also by the mission to prevent human talent from going to waste by ensuring it is exposed to the right opportunities. The end goal is to build THE global job network and deliver real-time liquidity of jobs and candidates.

## Technology & Features

Using several types of artificial intelligence, including self-driving recruiters that replicate human intuition, Torre can automatically locate the best candidates from hundreds of sources, attract them, screen them, filter them, rank them, deliver detailed reports about each, and even re-engage them. Torre users can create a "genome," a profile that serves as an expanded résumé and includes information about their skills, experience, salary expectations, location and language preferences, personality traits, etc.

## Growth & Support

Torre is backed by early investors and executives from Apple, Amazon, Meta, and SpaceX. In 2020, Torre reached 1 million users and extended its presence to 180 countries.

## Overview

Torre provides endpoints and an MCP server to discover candidates, filter them, rank them, and everything in between. The API also offers endpoints and MCP server to discover jobs and let AI apply on your behalf.

## Key Capabilities

**For Companies (Candidate Search):**
- Torre knows how to find, engage, filter, and rank candidates for most job types, allowing you to browse your candidate database using dozens of criteria.
- Torre gives you what you need to create your own AI agent using your preferred LLM and can store job requirements, candidates, and applications, and query them in multiple ways.

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Torre.ai's job network, candidate interaction, transparency, and ranking score:

## Torre.ai Job Network Overview

Torre.ai is automating recruitment and job hunting with super-intelligent AI, becoming the AI talent agent for millions of professionals with the goal to build THE global job network and deliver real-time liquidity of jobs and candidates.

## Candidate Interaction & Transparency

Torre is committed to providing candidates with transparency and has made the workings of their feature calculations and overall scoring algorithms completely transparent to all users, allowing candidates to understand precisely why and how they are ranked in their system.

Candidates don't have to guess how well their application is doing - they find out how they rank against other candidates using dozens of factors. Additionally, Torre provides feedback to every candidate at every stage of the recruitment process and tells them how they rank when compared to other candidates, why they rank the way they do, and what they can do to improve their ranking.

## Ranking Score System

Torre replicates human intuition using 100+ factors to screen, filter, and rank candidates automatically and accurately. Torre captures thousands of data points across 112 factors and feeds them into 9 types of AI to identify and rank candidates, with a prediction score ranging from 0 to 100%.

Torre has made the workings of their feature calculations and overall scoring algorithms completely transparent to all users, allowing candidates to understand precisely why and how they are ranked, and provides actionable insights into what aspects of their profiles they can improve.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.text:
Here is a comprehensive research summary of Torre.ai:

---

# Torre.ai - Comprehensive Research Summary

## 1. What Torre.ai Is and Its Core Value Proposition

Torre.ai is a global AI-powered professional networking and job-matching platform founded in 2019 by Colombian-American entrepreneur Alexander Torrenegra. The company's stated mission is to prevent human talent from going to waste by ensuring it is exposed to the right opportunities. Their ultimate goal is to build "THE global job network" and deliver real-time liquidity of jobs and candidates.

**Core value proposition:** Torre positions itself as the first company to have fully automated recruiting end-to-end, describing itself as "the Waymo for recruiting." Instead of relying on traditional resumes and manual recruiter work, Torre replaces that process with AI-driven matching using a rich structured profile called a "professional genome." The result, they claim, is a hiring process that is 3x faster, 50% less expensive, and significantly more accurate than conventional methods.

The platform covers 180+ countries, has over 1 million users (reached in 2020), and is backed by early investors and executives from Apple, Amazon, Meta, and SpaceX. Total funding is approximately $15 million, including a $10 million seed round in April 2021.

---

## 2. How Job Matching / Talent Matching Works

Torre's matching engine is the centerpiece of the platform. Rather than keyword-matching a resume to a job description, it works in the following stages:

1. **Job description as query generator** - The job listing acts as a structured query that generates matching criteria.
2. **Genome comparison** - Every candidate's genome is compared against those criteria across 112+ factors.
3. **Scoring** - Each candidate-job pair receives a match prediction score from 0 to 100%.
4. **Ranked output** - Candidates are ranked in descending order from "highest potential match" to "lower potential match."
5. **Genome completeness as a modifier** - Candidates with more complete genomes are ranked more accurately because there is more data to validate their placement.

Torre uses 9 distinct types of AI in combination to power this engine:
- Decision-tree learning
- Clustering
- Large Language Models (GPT)
- Machine-learning regressions
- PageRank algorithms
- Random forests
- Gradient boosting regressors
- Recommender engines
- Word2Vec (NLP)

The system analyzed over 10 million professional profiles in 2024 and claims to reduce hiring time by up to 30%.

---

## 3. The "Genome" or Skill-Based Matching System

The professional genome is Torre's alternative to the traditional resume. It is a structured, multi-dimensional profile that captures thousands of data points across many dimensions:

| Category | Examples |
|---|---|
| Work history | Roles, companies, dates, responsibilities |
| Hard skills | Technical capabilities, tools, languages |
| Soft skills | Communication, leadership, collaboration |
| Preferences | Salary expectations, location, remote/in-person, languages |
| Psychometrics | 40+ professional behavioral traits |
| Behavioral models | HEXACO personality model, OCP (Organizational Culture Profile) instrument, Torre's own research |
| Self-awareness | Candidate-reported strengths and blind spots |
| Learning speed | Adaptability signals |
| Social graph | Contact networks, referrals |
| Validation signals | Reference checks, recommendations, certifications, portfolio |

A key component is Torre's **skill graph** - a graph database that maps how all professional skills relate to each other. This allows the matching engine to reason about adjacent and transferable skills, not just exact keyword matches.

Psychometric assessments are scientifically grounded in established models. Torre auto-analyzes 40+ professional behavioral traits, making this portion of the genome low-friction for candidates to complete.

---

## 4. Key Platform Features

### For Candidates

- **Professional Genome Profile** - A living, structured alternative to a resume, publicly shareable and indexed by search engines.
- **Job Search** - Searchable at `torre.ai/search/jobs`, filtered by skills, location, salary, contract type, etc.
- **Match Score Transparency** - Candidates can see how they rank against other applicants and receive specific feedback on why they rank the way they do and what they can improve.
- **Job Network for Candidates** - A dedicated feed that surfaces matched opportunities automatically.
- **AI Job Application (beta)** - Torre's AI can apply to any job on behalf of the candidate, even on external platforms.

### For Companies / Recruiters

- **Torre OS** - Described as "the most advanced CRM and applicant tracking system," with 82+ unique functionalities covering the full recruiting lifecycle.
- **Torre ATS** - An AI-native applicant tracking system. Automatically surfaces previous applicants for new job openings, manages pipeline stages, and sends automated candidate communications.
- **Emma - AI Recruiter** - Torre's autonomous AI recruiter (see section 6). Covers 90%+ of traditional recruiter tasks.
- **Job Distribution** - Publishes job openings to 15+ channels including LinkedIn, TikTok, Facebook, X, WhatsApp, job boards, and online communities.
- **Candidate Databases** - Auto-builds and enriches candidate databases from across the web.
- **Emma Reach** - A dedicated outbound sourcing product that identifies and attracts passive candidates.
- **Torre Hunt** - Outsourced end-to-end recruitment where Emma handles the full hiring process.
- **Subtorres** - Allows communities, companies, or individuals to spin up their own branded job board powered by Torre's AI infrastructure. Torre automatically imports relevant jobs from job boards, social media, and ATSs and drives traffic via the Torre Job Network, AI agents, search engines, and email marketing.

---

## 5. API Capabilities

Torre offers a public API surface split into two tracks, plus an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for LLM agent integration.

### API for Companies (`torre.ai/apiforcompanies`)
- Search and filter candidates from Torre's database using dozens of criteria
- Store job requirements, candidates, and applications and query them in multiple ways
- Integrate with existing ATS, HRIS, or ERP systems
- Access real-time compensation benchmarks (actual salary expectations from millions of candidates)
- Adaptive interview guidance - the API tells you what question to ask the candidate next to reduce match/unmatch uncertainty
- Auto-identify matching candidates from your own database for new openings
- Use Torre's skill graph to power skill-adjacency reasoning in your own product
- Build your own AI agent using your preferred LLM on top of Torre's data and infrastructure

### API for Candidates (`torre.ai/apiforcandidates`)
- Discover job opportunities programmatically
- Delegate AI-driven job application to Torre's agent
- Receive webhook pings when a new job matches the candidate's preferences
- Status: **Private beta** as of the most recent available information

### MCP Server
Torre exposes an MCP server endpoint, indicating they are actively integrating with the emerging LLM agent ecosystem (compatible with Claude, GPT-based agents, etc.).

---

## 6. How Candidates and Companies Interact on the Platform

Interaction is largely mediated by Torre's AI layer rather than being direct person-to-person at the top of the funnel. The flow looks roughly like:

1. **Job posting** - Company creates a job in Torre OS (or it is imported from external sources).
2. **Emma activates** - Emma distributes the job across 15+ acquisition channels and proactively sources candidates.
3. **Candidate engagement** - Candidates either discover the job organically or are contacted by Emma via Torre Messenger, email, WhatsApp, or SMS.
4. **Application** - Candidates apply themselves, or Emma applies on their behalf.
5. **Screening and ranking** - AI automatically screens, filters, and ranks all applicants using genome matching.
6. **Transparency to candidates** - Candidates receive a score showing where they stand, why, and what they can do to improve. Torre often tells candidates who did not get an offer the specific reason.
7. **Shortlisting** - Companies receive a ranked shortlist (typically 6-7 strong candidates surfaced from 200-500 applicants).
8. **Reference checks** - Emma automates reference checking.
9. **Re-engagement** - Candidates who were not selected are kept in the pipeline and notified of future relevant openings automatically.

---

## 7. Unique UX Patterns

- **Genome as identity** - The profile is not a resume upload. It is a structured, first-party data form that progressively prompts users for richer information over time. Completeness is gamified by the genome completion ranker, which rewards fuller profiles with better match placement.
- **Transparent scoring** - Unlike most ATS platforms that hide ranking logic from candidates, Torre exposes the match score, the contributing factors, and improvement suggestions. This is a deliberate UX differentiator.
- **Bidirectional matching** - The fit score is mutual: it predicts whether a candidate fits the role and team, and whether the role and team fit the candidate. This is surfaced to both sides.
- **Compensation transparency** - Salary expectations are part of the genome and are surfaced to companies as benchmark data, reducing late-stage mismatches.
- **AI as the primary recruiter UX** - Emma interacts with candidates in natural language via multiple channels (chat, email, WhatsApp, SMS), handling screening conversations that traditionally required a human recruiter.
- **Subtorres embedded job boards** - A white-label / embedded job board product for communities and companies, powered by the same matching infrastructure.
- **Skill graph navigation** - The platform allows talent search by skill with awareness of related/adjacent skills, so a search for "React" might surface candidates with strong Vue.js or Angular skills as related matches.

---

## Sources

- [Torre.ai - The new global job network](https://torre.ai/)
- [Torre's Job-Matching Model](https://torre.ai/jobmatchingmodel)
- [Torre's Job-Matching Model | Genome completion](https://torre.ai/jobmatchingmodel/genomecompletion)
- [Professional genomes: Tomorrow's résumé today](https://torre.ai/en/genome)
- [Torre API](https://torre.ai/api)
- [Torre API for companies](https://torre.ai/apiforcompanies)
- [Torre API for candidates](https://torre.ai/apiforcandidates)
- [Emma of Torre.ai](https://torre.ai/emma)
- [Emma Reach](https://torre.ai/reach)
- [Torre Hunt](https://torre.ai/hunt)
- [Torre OS](https://torre.ai/os)
- [Torre ATS](https://torre.ai/ats)
- [Torre Job Network](https://torre.ai/jobnetwork)
- [Torre Job Marketplace](https://torre.ai/jobmarketplace)
- [Subtorres](https://torre.ai/subtorres)
- [Torre Tech](https://torre.ai/tech)
- [Torre for companies](https://torre.ai/forcompanies)
- [Torre for candidates](https://torre.ai/forcandidates)
- [How Does Torre Company Work? - CanvasBusinessModel.com](https://canvasbusinessmodel.com/blogs/how-it-works/torre-how-it-works)
